name: Hanson Wade
slogan: We create niche information products for business communities

jobs.title: Head of Prospect Database
jobs.description:
Hanson Wade are a fast-growing business information company creating niche information products. Our events and data products are curated towards specific audiences but managed as one database to maintain our single customer view. As we scale, our data management needs become increasingly more complex. To maintain our data quality and integrity whilst maximising the value of our data research, we are recruiting a Head of Database Management/Prospect Database.  

Reporting to our Technology Director and working closely with our Marketing function, the ideal candidate will transform our Database Management from an operational oversight to a strategic function. In alignment with our business model and vision, you will implement a sophisticated data governance and management framework spanning all product lines across multiple industries.  

We are looking for someone to take ownership of this area and provide data as a fundamental strategic asset to the business operations. On average, our prospect database influences 70% of a product’s revenue. The quality and integrity of that data is key to our success. We want you to help us maintain that success and, for the right candidate, expand the remit of a core business function.  

Here’s what you’ll do: 
•	Define and report data quality measures to improve the business value of our prospect database 
•	Implement data governance standards and processes - knowing overall organizational and marketing objectives 
•	Report on database compliance in accordance with GDPR and applicable international privacy regulations  
•	Manage external vendors that feed into our database 
•	Ensure data from source systems is accurate, available and fit for purpose 
•	Manage and improve the company database – maintaining, building and ensuring the usefulness of our company database in outreaching client  
•	Provide guidance on segmentation strategies based on expert understanding of our underlying data 
•	Maintain a high quality process with end-users to submit their requests for data research 
•	Manage the communications frequency and overlap of VIP Prospects 
•	Provide proactive and reactive training to all users on maintaining database health  

What we are looking for: 
•	Prior experience managing customer and prospect databases to support the marketing vision of a business 
•	Experience with Salesforce and its database functionality 
•	Strong understanding of relational databases and how to manipulate data 
•	Experience defining marketing segmentation in accordance with marketing needs  
•	Experience working with marketing automation platforms such as Eloqua and Pardot 
•	Demonstrated Excel and reporting skills  
•	Ability to identify process improvements and roll out  
•	Able to engage all level of stakeholders through brilliant communication 
•	An obsession with keeping data neat and clean  
•	Experience in events industry or companies with multiple overlapping products preferable 

Why choose us?
•	Hanson Wade is one of the top 100 fastest growing SMEs in the UK and our culture is truly phenomenal.
•	Our training and career progression opportunities would be hard to beat elsewhere.
•	Our culture consistently remains at the heart of what we do.
•	We offer a fast-tracked career in a successful, expanding company with global scope
•	Company benefits including monthly awards & social events, season ticket loan, cycle to work scheme, office yoga, a run club, charity day and many more…

Hanson Wade is an amazing company to work for. But don’t take our word for it. Our Glassdoor rating makes us one of the leading employers in the country – check out the reviews for yourself.

£40,000 - £55,000 depending on experience + Bonus
